title: Serial shooter who allegedly killed two homeless men is also homeless, family reveals - New York Post
content:
1. Serial shooter who allegedly killed two homeless men is also homeless, family reveals  New York Post
  2. Suspect arrested in shootings of homeless people in Washington, D.C., New York, police say  CBS News
  3. D.C. Mayor Announces Suspect In Custody After Violent Attacks On Homeless Men  NBC News
  4. Prosecute him, help them: We must bring killer of homeless men to justice, but that’s not enough  New York Daily News
  5. Suspect in deadly shooting spree of DC, NYC homeless people arrested  New York Post
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: Gerald Brevard III, 30, was taken into custody early Tuesday in the capital and charged with first-degree murder in the March 9 shooting and stabbing death of 54-year-old homeless man Morgan Holmes…
